Package ygong.APS

This package contains the classes that are used to implement the APS (Advanced Planning and Scheduling) project.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GanttChart<X,Y>
    This GanttChart class is copied from Roland
    GanttChart.ExtraData
    The colored block for GanttChart
    Machine
    A class that represents a machine in the APS system
    Order
    This class represents an order in the APS system.
    Schedule
    This class represents a schedule in the APS system.
    Schedule.Grade
    Helper class for calculating the grade of the schedule
    Schedule.MachineWithOrders
    Helper class for Machines
    Schedule.OrderWithTime
    Helper class for Orders
    Scheduler
    The Scheduler class is used to generate all possible schedules and calculate the grade for each schedule based on the weights given.
    Scheduler.scheduleOrder
    The scheduleOrder class is used to schedule all orders in a schedule

    Rules

Package ygong.APS Description

This package contains the classes that are used to implement the APS (Advanced Planning and Scheduling) project. The APS project is a project that aims to optimize the scheduling of tasks in a production environment. The project is implemented in Java and uses JavaFX for the GUI. The project consists of several classes that implement the different components of the APS system, such as the scheduler, the schedule, and the Gantt chart.

This is a personal project that I implemented during my internship at Linkedata. The project is just a prototype and is not intended for production use.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yuyang Gong
Note:
We are only consider a order finished on a single machine which is a unrelated machine scheduling problem , not a job-shop schduling problem
